javaslang

Interface Value<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the wrapped value.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Match.MatchMonad<R>, Match.MatchMonad.MatchMonadWithWhen<T,R>, Option<T>, Try<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Either.LeftProjection, Either.RightProjection, Failure, Lazy, Match.MatchMonad.Matched, Match.MatchMonad.Otherwise, Match.MatchMonad.Unmatched, None, Some, Success

    public interface Value<T>
    A representation of value which may be either defined or empty.

    How the empty state is interpreted depends on the context, i.e. it may be undefined, failed, not yet defined, etc.

    Since:
    2.0.0
